Detailed Description

: Adapter class for initialization of sample consensus based segmentation method which requires point normals

double brics_3d::RegionBasedSACSegmentationUsingNormals::normalDistanceWeight [private]

The relative weight (between 0 and 1) to corresponding to angular distance between point normals and the plane normal.

0 corresponds to 0 rad and 1 corresponds to pi/2 rad

Definition at line 51 of file RegionBasedSACSegmentationUsingNormals.h.
